website_summaries.verdict: A simple design that can fit 200 photos and comes in a wide variety of colors.
pros: Album doesn't cost much and the simple design means it'll match your existing collection
Your photos will be safe, as the pages are free from any harmful chemicals
There is space to write notes next to every photo
cons: Has clear sticky pages you have to remove to add photos, not slots

customer_reviews.title: We've created a whole collection with these albums!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this same type of fabric photo album from Pioneer in various colors, capacities, and sizes for the 11 years my husband and I have been married. We use a different color each time to show the order all of the pictures go. The albums have held up so well, and I love the small caption writing space this album has next to the pics. We don't display them with the dust cover it comes with because they've held up well without it, they look better without in my opinion, and any dust is easily wiped off without leaving a mark on the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Frenzel

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised because this item had such good reviews but the product is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised because this item had such good reviews but the product is terrible! The photo pockets were stuck to the page and when I tried to put a photo in the pocket would literally come off the page. It left a horrible mark too. It is poorly made and the pockets are cheap plastic sticking to the page.
customer_reviews.author: Asialee Drews

customer_reviews.title: Has no pockets for holding pictures
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. The description talks of "pockets". There are no pockets for holding pictures. Just a whole-page clear overlay sheet on each page. So I folded that clear sheet back and put the pictures onto the page. The pictures did not cling or hold. When I put the clear sheet back over the pictures I hoped something magic would happen to hold everything in place. It didn't. When I picked up the album the pictures fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter Pie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Construction
customer_reviews.text: This photo album has a sturdy construction with a nice plastic covering to protect the cloth binder. The pages accommodate 4x6 photographs nicely, with either 2 horizontal per page, or 1 vertical per page. Room is available to write a memo next to each photo. Pages are securely bound in the spine. In all, a very good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Salina Breeze

customer_reviews.title: it looks like a Steel blue with more blue in it than ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2-pack of Sky Blue 200-pg. As per my screen, the color looks Dark Cornflower blue but based from other reviewers its really sky blue so i gave it a shot. In reality, it looks like a Steel blue with more blue in it than gray or true blue when you looked it up in google. I like it. I havent inserted my pics yet since im still waiting for it. Will update once im able to put them in. Dimensions: 9.5"(h) x 9.5"(l) x 1.70"(w)
customer_reviews.author: Frances A.

customer_reviews.title: Disaster of a product, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Hard to understand the large amount of positive reviews for this product, perhaps faked? It started to fall apart upon first use - as I attempted to slide pictures in, the weak adhesive holding the plastic sheath to each page came apart like nothing, rendering some pages totally unusable. Subsequently, even just turning pages has caused more of this damage. An embarrassing lack of quality, manufacturers should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Nechemya Kagedan

customer_reviews.title: Photo Album in Tranquil Aqua
customer_reviews.text: I'm still a bit "old school" and love printing out my pictures and putting them in photo albums. I only use Pioneer photo albums with a fabric frame and each album holds 200 4x6 photos. The only thing I would change is I wish some of the pages had photo sleeves for pictures to go in vertically, instead of all of them being horizontal, but I still love these albums. The tranquil aqua is a very pretty color and I can't wait to fill it with pictures. I would definitely order another of this album.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a small warning
customer_reviews.text: I have a few o f these books and they're great for photos. The pockets can rip a bit but if intact they hold the photo very securely. It's hard to place a vertical and horizontal photo on the same side but can be done if you need to. The small warning is that the colors are MUCH more muted in the photos than they are in person. In person they're very vibrant and bright. Whether that's a positive or negative is up to you but just be careful if you are looking for the exact shades shown.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible solvent smell
customer_reviews.text: This product has a terrible smell of solvent that is almost impossible to bear. I ordered four and have them in my libary with my windows open. I wished such a nice product had been produced under more ecological aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Reihs

customer_reviews.title: well made photo album
customer_reviews.text: We want to put together a photo album for my MIL. She doesn't really go online and would prefer to sit in her chair and peruse pictures, so this worked perfectly. It's well made with good pockets for photos. There are 200 pockets, but it is limited to 4x6 photos. We got the chocolate brown, very pretty, but there is a wide variety of colors. Archival, photo safe: acid, lignin and PVC free , and it has an area to write a short memo, location, date, people's names etc. The front also has a frame for a picture. Overall this is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: Horrible overpowering chemical smell from the plastic sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Horrible overpowering chemical smell from the plastic sleeves. I almost sent them back but I ordered a bunch. I had to set them out on the porch to air for A MONTH. If you're sensitive to chemicals, don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: TLH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The candy apple red is beautiful! Its a bright red which is a fun color. The texture is a soft felty feeling. It actually comes with a plastic sleeve over it that you could keep on it if you really wanted to in order to protect it but i took mine off. The pictures slide in from the side so only a 4x6 will fit. The paper is not see through so you will not see the picture on the other side. I will definitely be buying another one once this is filled up with our vacation pictures
customer_reviews.author: @mariss_v

customer_reviews.title: There's a place to ID the photo next to it!
customer_reviews.text: I already own some of these and am in the process of preparing life photo albums for my grandchildren consisting of special moments in their lives. I bought these as a gift for a great niece or nephew due in August so his/her parents can begin a life album for them starting now. They're attractive, well put together and there is a space for noting the photo so you don't have to take it out and read the back. It holds 200 4x6 photos but the page can be adjusted to hold a large one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: akaDopey

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Super cute =)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a little hesitant because of the amount of negative reviews, I ordered the turquoise 200 pocket album and already filled it and it looks CUTE! The fabric feels very high quality and the pockets are perfect for 4x6 photos. Inserting them requires patience but anyone with 200 photos to fit in an album has to have patience! Memos are a little hard to write the first few pages but then it gets easy. I can't stop looking at my album and how pretty it turned out! I already bought another for my mother in law as Christmas present. Great product for the price =)
customer_reviews.author: Zoey.B

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: Great color and the pocket and description design will make this a perfect spot for my before and after photos of a summer home that we purchased. As others have mentioned, there is a chemical odor when you first receive the album. I simply placed mine in an airy location for a couple of days and it was fine. Great value for the price and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: Be very gentle putting photos in this album. The top corners (where the opening is for the photo) started ripping on almost every single page as I placed photos in. It didn't seem to matter how careful I was. You can get cheaper, better quality albums elsewhere, so I really can't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Beyer-Zinsli

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟😊
customer_reviews.text: Fabric frame cover photo album I give it 5 star 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 They are fast on shipping in a package it's really good and if I was to get more photo albums this would be the one I would choose because it holds a lot of pictures and it is really pretty
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Robertson 😊

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly Disappointed. Terrible chemical smell when opened the package which gave me a terrible headache. Vaguely remember seeing this comment but hoped it wouldn't be this bad. Pages are glossy so writing in ink pen smears. And glossy pages make it hard to slide pictures in pocket. In addition to pages being glossy it is incredibly hard to write on left side of book because of the way the book has been bound. Will not purchase this brand EVER again. Will pay extra couple dollars for the more expensive/better quality books.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, great quality, have had it for 5 months, no issues
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!, I had no issues with any thing breaking or the pages falling out like I have seen in other reviews, we’ve had this for about five months now, obviously we don’t look through it every single day but I have no issues with it, perfect caption size, for pictures between the two pages and it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with this beautiful blue photo album. I placed 200 photos of our family in this album which I will present to my Grandson for his upcoming birthday, I know he'll love it. I especially love this front cover where one can insert a special photo. The fact that I can write what's in the photo next to the photo., is a plus. This is well made in every way, and I'm happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Patty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to catalogue for family!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely fabulous and affordable picture books. I went to Costco and printed out about 1000 pictures and bought several of these and was able to catalogue our entire last 10 years in just a few hours. The plastic is durable and easy to get pictures in without bending/warping and the outside is a nice clean look that is uniform on the shelf. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: James Anderson

customer_reviews.title: So so...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color of this since it was going to hold pictures of our trip to Mexico. I also liked that it had room for a picture on the cover. When putting the pictures in however, I noticed right away that the cover was not sturdy. You could never lay another photo book or any book on top of it. I feel it will not hold up very well. From now on I will be paying more careful attention to how the covers are actually made.
customer_reviews.author: KMA

customer_reviews.title: Fine Album-But Not Useful for Today's Pictures
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly a fine photo album and I have no complaints about its quality. However, I do dislike its design. The album is all for landscape pictures and almost all of the pictures I had printed out are in portrait. I think in the past, when people had digital cameras, they were more likely to take landscape pictures and this album would have been ideal. However, with camera phones, people are taking more and more portrait pictures over landscape pictures and this album then becomes somewhat useless. The album does not really allow you to put any pictures in portrait and thus loses points for flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Moore

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for non adhesive pages for OLD photos, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: All of my old photos have dates and writing on the back, I’d never want to permanently stick them to anything and lose that. Writing it next to it isn’t the same, especially with lost loved ones. It’s those written words, even if it’s just dates, that are truly special. I know this doesn’t apply to anyone with new photos. I will be ordering more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ashersmom

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not as described. It’s a very nice photo album, and it will hold a lot of pictures, and I can still use it, but it’s not sectioned the way it’s described. I have very old photos that are about 3 to 4 inches square. The description stated that they were 4 x 6 sections separated. But actually there’s only about a 2 inch separation in each pocket, a little small photo will just slide down into the bottom section. Like I said, I can still use it with the newer photos, but I purchased this specifically for the smaller square photos,
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Perro

customer_reviews.title: A great versatile photo album.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this album can hold pictures both horizontal and vertical. Sometimes when placing pictures in and out of a photo album you'll tear the plastic off from the sheet. Well this is not the case with this photo album. I was able to take pictures in and out multiple times without any tearing or issues. I would like to say that it was because I have learned and I was more careful; however, that would be a lie. All props to this photo album. I love the cloth texture to it. It gives it a sturdiness that makes me comfortable with others looking through the album.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my niece for Christmas. The pockets were a little tight to slide the pictures in, but once they were in, it stayed put nicely. I loved how there was the option for the memo beside each pocket. I liked the option of the dust protector that it came with. It should make storing a little easier and cleaner for her. I would buy this album again just based on the variety of colors available, the amount of photos it holds, and the memo option.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this book, wish it had sturdier pages.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make a cookbook with the many personal recipes Ive collected from my mother and friends. I like the look of this book and left the plastic cover on being in the kitchen and all. It protects it so well. The pages aren't as sturdy as I would have liked. The plastic pulls away easily from the paper page when you try to insert a card into the pocket. I may have to maintain it a bit by regaling them down as they get bad.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Wi

customer_reviews.title: A Problem This Time
customer_reviews.text: I've bought from this company 4 times before and enjoyed these compact photo albums that hold so many pictures. However, the last one I bought had some photo inserts in the middle that did not stick. I am going to have to use tape to hold my pictures in. That was disheartening because I filled half the album before I found the problem. My photo albums that are 10 years old from this company have the plastic inserts that still stick. Irene L.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Lonergan

customer_reviews.title: Overall good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the films inside the pages as they are not thin, wrinkly type, but are thick and durable and clean-looking. Love that they come in many different colors. I would purchase more so build a collection later on! Just wish they didn't have P logo all over the pages and Memo written twice each page. It would have given a cleaner look overall and less distracting from the photos I put in.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I anticipated based on other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I anticipated based on other reviews. The color is nice but the fabric has a strong glue smell and is frayed a bit in the corners of the cut out on the front. Binding is very flimsy and I'm almost embarrassed to give this as the gift I bought it to be. You get what you pay for I guess. The only reason I give it a 3 instead of a 2 is that the price fits the quality. I would be way more upset if I spent more on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best album to buy on Amazon! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very good album. Both the outside and inside are very high quality and the pages appear to be thick. The photo sleeves are somewhat thin but does the job very well. I also love how the sleeves point towards the binding so if the album ever gets dropped, the pictures don’t fall out all over the place. I also love how the albums come with a clear plastic sleeve to keep the fabric looking nice and clean. Not only that, but there is a sleeve in the inner side of the front cover we’re you can put a photo of your own. Although it’s not a 6x4 cut out.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, bad QA
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom's memorial service so guests could add a photo and leave a short note. Unfortunately, it's really bad quality. The first one I ordered had scuff marks on it. The replacement pockets for the photos tore easily. Since we didn't have time to get anything else, we used this at the memorial, but it feels really cheap and I regret buying it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: FeedbackfromCali

customer_reviews.title: love it but doesn't have vertical slots!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the sage color and the quality of the album. My only complaint is that the product description on amazon led me to believe that there were pages with vertical spaces for photos as well as horizontal, but my album only has horizontal slots. Maybe I read something wrong! But I still like it and am keeping it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McRee

customer_reviews.title: Recommended...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing photo album I ever purchased. I am happy to upload more than 150 photos in it without any problem. Nice one. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: sukajee

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 albums in teal, and the colors/textures don't match
customer_reviews.text: This photo album fits the bill. It is a more reasonably priced version of the Kolo albums, which is what I was looking for. The only caution is that I later re-ordered a second one in the same color (teal), and the colors and textures don't match.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: It smelled SO bad when we took it out of the plastic. We had to set it aside to air out. There's plenty of space in this album, but be careful putting your prints in. I was gentle, but the plastic "pockets" easily came unglued around the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Soprano

customer_reviews.title: Good traditional photo album, but strong chemical smell at first
customer_reviews.text: Size and color were what I expected, but the plastic odor was not. Very strong chemical smell when I took it out of the package. I aired it out standing up with the pages fanned open for a week before putting photos in it. Now it seems much better, but if you put it to your face the odor is detectable. Overall though it does the job of a traditional photo album which seem harder to find these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and good value
customer_reviews.text: I like the many colors this photo book comes in. I also like the fact that it has places to make notes beside the photos. My only small problem was that I didn't realize some of the pages were kind of stuck together until I had written and entered my photos. The pages are not removable so I just cut a few of them out.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: When I received the album the smell was terrible. I sat it outside for several hours and it helped some. The photo slots are not really set up for vertical photos and when putting horizontal pictures in the glue holding the plastic came loose on several photos. The album looks good, but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The album is beautiful and perfect to place all of my 4x7 pictures in. I would have given a complete 5 start except it smells like acetone & there was a finger nail wedged in one of the pages.. completely gross but over all the album is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Irias

customer_reviews.title: Creating a lasting photo memory!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this album and filled it with my daughter’s birthday pictures. It was a perfect gift and looks even better with the pics. It is sturdy and the picture sleeves are durable and easy to load with the pictures. I bought Blue her favorite color!
customer_reviews.author: Msdaz

customer_reviews.title: Lovely photo album
customer_reviews.text: You can store a lot of photo in clear plastic covers on each page, eighter vertically or horizontally. However, the covers are designed for horizontal pictures, and vertical images do not seem that well in this display. The thing I loved the most about this album is that you can put a smaller dimensional photo on the cover of the album. It is a graphical label for your album :)
customer_reviews.author: Sina

customer_reviews.title: Great for landscape photos that don't get taken out often
customer_reviews.text: The book's plastic was clear and didn't have any distortion, so it's good for viewing from, but the glue for the plastic starts to come off if you take the photo out 2-3 times. The pages, while technically holding portrait photos, have an odd insert in the median of what would be two landscape photos keeping about an inch to an inch and a half of margin between the edge of the image and the edge of the page.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is deceiving, very different shade
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many of these photo albums and really like them but the one that arrived today is not accurate of what is offered. Even though it says "citrus green" the album I thought I would get would be more of a dark apple green. Bummed, but I will keep it. The pictures I have attached may not look too different but it is.
customer_reviews.author: Songbird

customer_reviews.title: VERY strong odor upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The material for the cover is soft and durable, but when I first opened the plastic around the photo album, there was a VERY strong odor coming from the album. It smells like paint or something. Hopefully it goes away after a couple days. The odor is so strong that it's giving me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Pages not on 3 ring binder
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an album that didn’t fall apart. The ones I have tried with three rings rip before you can turn a page. Not sturdy enough to hold photos. This one will offer me no problem. I may need to order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great album except for the smell
customer_reviews.text: This album, while super cute and perfect for its use, smelled strongly of paint upon opening out of the package. I had ordered two of these albums and it was the same strong paint scent with both :(
customer_reviews.author: TexasCaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color options and the price. The outside cover is really nice and binding appears to be sturdy....BUT....the pages tear easily and one of the pages was stained when it arrived. I wouldnt recommend this for a gift. The quality is just not up to par
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: It has 200 windows for 4 x 6 photos and a memo space alongside each photo.
customer_reviews.text: I have thousands of photos now because of digital technology. But I still like to pick the best and have prints made of them and put in albums - sometimes it is fun to just sit with family and look through albums instead of your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: Don’t mind paying this price but this poor quality is not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The photo pockets are not glued on well and easily rip off the page. I have others that look like this but are not so cheap inside. It makes me wonder whether these great reviews were of a product that has now changed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Katsiotas

customer_reviews.title: disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: I was so careful trying to put my photos in this picture album but the plastic cellophane kept pulling away from the page every single time, the clue did not hold. very disappointed. very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful album. Like that I can write about the ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful album. Like that I can write about the photo. Had to air it out for a few days. The glue has a pretty sharp odor to it or is it the clear plastic sleeves. Not sure, but most likely the glue. I used a hot glue gun to embellish the cover with steel lettering and other items.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda J. Lewman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect photo album to keep treasured memories
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold photos from our honeymoon and it was perfect. I was looking for a large album to hold all of our pictures in one place so we can enjoy them for years to come. I highly recommend this album for its beautiful cover and the pages were easy to slip the pictures in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Kaileigh

customer_reviews.title: Great for my son
customer_reviews.text: I gave a my 2 year-old this photo album with pictures of him in it. He loves it. It isn't quite toddler-proof, though. I need to supervise him with it or the clear sheets that hold the pictures tear. But I am surprised how well it has held up so far. The only thing that I am not crazy about is that it has glossy pages, which are not easy to write on when writing captions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I print pictures all the time for keep sakes and I’ve had a hard time finding a photo album that I really like and this one was perfect! Super easy and pretty good quality. The outside looks great
customer_reviews.author: Savannah knox

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and feel
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized photo album. The fabric cover is much nicer than the cheap-looking fake leather ones. It would look nice both on a shelf or on a coffee table, and the photo slot on the front cover is a nice touch. The photo slots on the pages were easy to fill, but I noticed that the film on the top right of almost every page tore away from the paper when I tried to slide a photo in unless I held the page down firmly and completely flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHOTO ALBUM!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this very nice album!! Very good quality, easy to load 4x6 photos (up to 200), lovely look and feel to the product. Worth the price. Color Cobalt Blue is PERFECT for my husband's Birthday gift!!! I would buy it again in a minute!!
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Nice Album
customer_reviews.text: Lovely color and nice product. A couple of the little plastic slots ripped while putting pics in but that’s probably my own fault. It has a strong smell that’s unpleasant but I’m sure that will go away soon
customer_reviews.author: aurora mosher

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not great quality. The plastic page adhesive that holds the pictures in place is not sticking well, after I put a picture in, it falls apart. There is a huge white mark on the front of the book (see picture). Won’t be purchasing another, as I had intended to. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but...
customer_reviews.text: The product was sturdy and I found the pockets to be sturdy as well, however I found the item has a very strong chemical smell. I had also purchased a second one in another color and this one also had a very strong chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: JLK ya'll

customer_reviews.title: Only horizontal photos
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great album, BUT, it says you can put pictures horizontally and vertically. You can not! Only goes horizontally. But for the price, it held so many pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: much better than I thought it would be! I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.text: This is much nicer than I anticipated. Its a great size, and the pages are not flimsy. The photos slip in the plastic sleeves easily and it looks nice! There is a space next to each photo to write a little (very little). The fabric that covers the album is nice, too! I chose the royal blue color and its very pretty. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DZKimmi

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for multiple 4x6 photos. From the product photos it looks like you can also place one 4x6 phot vertically but I preferred the look of them horizontally in the slips. Super sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to insert pictures
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this album and it has held up really well but I only gave it four stars because it’s a little difficult to get the pictures into the slots. Once the pictures are in though, they stay in place really well!
customer_reviews.author: Mikalah Beveridge

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my niece
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my niece. The reviews were very good and the reason I selected this type of photo book as well as the color was my nieces choice. She was very happy to get at Christmas time. Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Stef Butterflies

customer_reviews.title: Memory Keeper
customer_reviews.text: I like that this album allows me to choose my own photo to show as the cover. I like that it's got versatile pages for different size pictures. The shade of red is not bright. It's pretty like a rosy tone.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful album, well organized
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful album. It has a plastic insert for two photos per page and next to each photo a place for comments. You can pick your favorite photo and put it on the cover. And there are a lot of cover colors to choose from. This will always be my choice in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joanzers in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Better options at craft store
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize the interior sheets are made out of paper backing and not plastic. So if liquids were to still in it accidentally, the pictures will get wet. There was a string off-gassing smell that I didn’t like but it’s from the manufacturing process.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I need two new items for my son’s baby photos. These was perfect. Exactly what I expected. The last book I had would come apart after sliding in the photo but this product is sturdier
customer_reviews.author: tracey legion

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made. Made a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Bachelorette party, we took pics & presented to the future bride another day. Nice material cover. Place for a photo on the front Made it personal.
customer_reviews.author: Christine E. Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Too many pages were stuck together so you could not insert any 4x6 photos in it. Not all, but to many for my liking. I like the fabric cover and the binding but putting pictures in was too difficult. My advice....skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Ziolkowski

customer_reviews.title: Fulfilled the need
customer_reviews.text: This is a good album, but the option to only have landscape style photos seemed unfortunate. The adhesive between each page was easily ripped. other wise the album did what we needed, except for the vertical pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Honest

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Album for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these albums! They are sturdy, durable and high quality. I love that they have areas for written captions for each picture as well. Definitely a great value and worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well for 10x11 photos.  Smaller photos are ok.
customer_reviews.text: Nice photo album worth the exception 10x11 photos will not fit. When I cut the photo down to fit, there is a strip of adhesive paper stuck to the plastic overlay. This shows only on 10x11 photos. Smaller photos are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. LaBell

customer_reviews.title: Good durable cover, horizontal slip ins only
customer_reviews.text: The cover feels durable. The fabric feels nice. The pictures slide in fairly easily. This only has horizontal slip ins so if you have vertical pictures keep that in mind. I only got the dark red because it was the cheapest of the colors. I like it overall. I might buy it again if other colors lower in price
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Marinelli

customer_reviews.title: The only issue
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice, but the only issue I have is that the pages are very flimsy and not even 10 mins in of putting my photos in, one of the sleeves rips. I easily fixed it with tape, but I shouldn’t even have to have that issue. Other than that, it IS a very nice photo album.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Pictures dont do it justice. It is very sturdy, large, and has memos on each side of the photos so you can add dates and what not to it. I love it and will be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Allain

customer_reviews.title: ... needed an album for an engagement present for my best friend and this photo album was perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed an album for an engagement present for my best friend and this photo album was perfect. The color was bright and exactly the color I needed! All in all, the bride loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The color is great and it's exactly the kind of album I was looking for. The pages aren't separated in two, like most of these kinds of albums. Instead, they just have a little notch near the end Not my favorite, but I made it work. Also, the plastic cover (the one that stays on it) came really wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this album, it’s got great value and is high quality for the price. I bought two for kid’s albums and I’ll probably get more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality and hold the photos in place much better ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Pioneer photo albums for a few years. They are good quality and hold the photos in place much better than other albums I have used. My one criticism of this album is that when I was sliding the photos into each slot, the windows were becoming disconnected from the page at the seams. This was not a huge problem, but I had to be very careful to avoid pulling them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for filling with photos for gifts for little kiddos ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered a few of these photo albums. They are perfect for filling with photos for gifts for little kiddos as it is so fun for them to see their memories in front of them instead of on some sort of technology! As I take new pictures, I print them out and place them in the back, so the events are chronological, very fun. These books are great quality and I like that they come in lots of different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Drumheller

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT quality. I really was not expecting something this heavy and amazing. Easy to insert pictures. Great for a lifetime. Even has spots to write small details for each photo.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice fir photos of my newest grandchild. It’s a girl, her mother Doesn’t like purple which would have been my choice, the lime green is lovely. I ordered a blue one for my newest great-grandchild’s photos
customer_reviews.author: valerie h frederick

customer_reviews.title: Bad Chemical smell,  Nice Photo Album
customer_reviews.text: I love the album, nice pages for photos with writing area to describe photo. What I DON'T like is the chemical smell, it has lasted for days. It must be the adhesive made in China. If you are concerned about chemicals in your home and cancer causing fumes, Don't buy this. If you have no health issues and don't have little kids around and want a nice photo album this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Tamm EE

customer_reviews.title: Great photo album
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a photo album to send to my mom and my mother-in-law with photos of their grandson for Christmas. This photo album fit the bill! It has a great cover, with a window for a photo, and 20 pockets for 4x6 photos. I was hoping that I could fit a couple of 8x10s in the pockets, but there is a small divider at the end of the pockets that prevent that from happening. Doesn't change that I love this photo album enough to buy one for myself as well. I'm very happy with my purchase, and the grandmothers are, too.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, easy to change photos.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these in red to use for Christmas photos. I couldn’t find any in the stores. This is exactly what I wanted/needed.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Most likely, will not last
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product simply because the ones we used to get from Perlhead were no longer available and this looked similar, but the quality is so poor that it tears apart as you insert the photos. The seals of each page is so minimum and the paper is inkjet printing quality that this album is definitely NOT going to last for years that you wish to enjoy with you family. Two stars for the cover fabric which has nice color, but it doesn't have spine window to insert title or date. If you are looking for something that lasts, it's worth few extra bucks to purchase better quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee lover

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, but very weak adhesive.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the book has a clothe type material on the cover but the slots for pictures tear apart really easily, still happy with it and it serves its purpose. I also like that there are memo lines next to the slots for photos.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Holds 4x6 pictures
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best photo album but it's built decently and the plastic for the picture slots are kinda stiff so you don't get a crikle looking picture. They also give spot to write next to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: BAM BAM

customer_reviews.title: Happy w/ the order
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Considering there’s room for 200 photos in each book, it’s honestly great. Most photo albums either hold less or are way more expensive. So definitely getting your moneys worth! Fabric on the outside is nice. Happy w/ the order.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic photo inserts don’t rip when I put photos in there. Also, nice fabric canvas feel. Comes with a plastic protector on the outside of it. It has a nice raspberry yogurt color to it. There’s just a little tiny spot where the fabric got nicked or something, but it’s no big deal at all. Great for my baby girl’s photos. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The description provided encouraged me to think this was a wonderful idea for a gift. Sadly, this album has an awful chemical smell. The moment I opened it I was very disappointed. Considering the pervasive and unpleasant odor the company who is responsible for production, in my opinion, needs to address and correct the reason for such a troubling odor. It cannot be healthy nor is it anything I would want to keep or give to another.
customer_reviews.author: SEALAKES

customer_reviews.title: I used this for our wedding album
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a traditional wedding with hundreds and hundreds of pictures from some big fancy party. We had 72 photos and this album was absolutely perfect for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: SherylBrown

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the time and don't buy this album
customer_reviews.text: Such poor quality. I tried sliding my photos in the clear protector sheets but they kept ripping. Then, the pages even started to rip at the top. Put about 10 photos in before I pulled them all out and requested a return. Spend the money on something that will stay together. I'm purchasing a Creative Memories album...more money but it will last. I have some from over fifteen years ago and they are still beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Too many pages were glued down so I had to tear the plastic cover off the paper page to get some of the photos in the slot. The paper stuck to the plastic cover and ya highly unattractive. Given its expense, I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: ADDICTED
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite photo albums, I use them all the time and I am trying to collect almost every color I have four of them already. They display photos perfectly and the photo album is sturdy I reccomend to not throw away the plastic cover they come in because they become easily dusty without it. I took it off the first time I purchased it on a baby blue one and now is getting lots of damage.
customer_reviews.author: Helloglamazon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, classy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three or four of these Pioneer photo albums over the past few years. They are so nice. They couldnt be easier to use. The pages are high quality. I have never had a page or photo pocket tear. The photos are nicely displayed, the albums themselves are classy with the fabric cover and I love the opening in the cover to display a photo.
customer_reviews.author: JayneDoah

customer_reviews.title: Basic photo album
customer_reviews.text: It’s a photo album. It would be nice if you could take pages out and reorganize, if you are going in a specific order and you forget one in the beginning like I did, you now have to redo the placement of all of the pictures. One of the pages ripped as I was turning the page. But the cover is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

product_meta.title: Fabric Frame Cover Photo Album 200 Pockets Hold 4x6 Photos, Sky Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:Sky BlueThis fabric cover photo album features a frame to insert a favorite photo and a deluxe rounded bookbound spine. The album's patented Bi-Directional pockets hold horizontal or vertical photos up to 4 x 6 inches. There is a memo writing area next to each pocket. Photos are displayed two per page. The album holds 200 photos up to 4 x 6 inches in optically clear pockets with a shaded paper background. Archival, photo safe: acid, lignin and PVC free.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This fabric cover photo album features a frame to insert a favorite photo and a deluxe rounded bookbound spine. The album's patented Bi-Directional pockets hold horizontal or vertical photos up to 4 x 6 inches. There is a memo writing area next to each pocket. Photos are displayed two per page. The album holds 200 photos up to 4 x 6 inches in optically clear pockets with a shaded paper background. Archival, photo safe: acid, lignin and PVC free.
feature_bullets: Fabric cover features a frame to insert a favorite photo and a deluxe rounded bookbound spine
Patented Bi-Directional pockets hold horizontal or vertical photos
Memo area next to each pocket
Archival, photo safe: acid, lignin and PVC free
